amendment.description: Amendments clarify that restrictions placed on studies and evaluations under child nutrition programs will be prospective and will not cover ongoing studies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of two amendments offered en bloc to provide that no funds are appropriated for establishment of any new child nutrition study and evaluation programs or new study and evaluation programs under WIC.

action.text: On agreeing to the Volkmer amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
